name: Middlespot
overview:
middlespot.com is an online productivity tool to help you manage the activity of search.

built to support the activities of searchers, middlespot provides a number of features to make managing search easier. A user can interpret their results more effectively by seeing their results as screenshots and text, and interrogate these results by panning and zooming in for more detail. A user can then save and manage each result in personalized workpads, where they can retrieve these collections at their desired time. A user can also share a workpad collection with anyone they choose, allowing for collaborative management of search efforts.

Middlespot supports the activity of search by maintaining a number of details of your search activity, including categorizing your recent searches, providing access to your workpads from multiple browsers and devices, and allowing you to capture a site to a workpad even when viewing that site outside of the middlespot interface.
